Package entity

Class Player

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.LivingEntity
entity.Player
public class Player extends LivingEntity
The Player class represents a player character in the game. It extends the LivingEntity class and includes additional properties specific to players.

      Constructs a Player with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the player.
      weight - The weight of the player.
      health - The health of the player.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the player.
      armor - The armor of the player.
      maxArmor - The maximum armor of the player.
      strength - The strength of the player.
      maxStrength - The maximum strength of the player.
      magic - The magic of the player.
      maxMagic - The maximum magic of the player.
      inventory - The inventory of the player.
      type - The type of the player.
      entityManager - The entity manager for managing the player.
      level - The level of the player.
      experience - The experience of the player.
      pseudo - The pseudo (nickname) of the player.
      spriteManager - The sprite manager for the player.
